doc:
Ruth Gilbert (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ruth_Gilbert_(actress) 0 Ruth Gilbert (May 8, 1912 – October 13, 1993) was an American actress, best known for her role as Alice in the first sound version of Alice in Wonderland in 1931, and as Max in The Milton Berle Show. Ruth_Gilbert ( May_8_,_1912 – October_13_,_1993 ) was an_American_actress , best_known for her_role as Alice in the_first_sound_version of Alice in Wonderland in 1931 , and as Max in The_Milton_Berle_Show .
